category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CC_ExtraPLMXMLInstanceAttributes
preference.preference_description: Defines any additional options to be used when exporting a tool design package to NX or when using the cc_writer command line utility. Valid Values: KeyEntry - Specifies the string that appears as the title attribute in the PLM XML code for the UserValue element. PropEntry - Specifies the string that appears as the value attribute in the PLM XML code for the UserValue element.
